title: Burnout Paradise
description:
Burnout Paradise

System Requirements
CPU:	2.8 GHz Pentium 4 or faster 3.2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent
RAM:	1 GB RAM XP / 1.5 GB Vista
VGA:	DirectX 9.0c compatible with Shader Model 3.0. Video card must be 128MB or more and contain one of the following chipsets: NVIDIA 6600 or greater; Radeon X1300 or greater.
DX:	DirectX 9.0c compatible
OS:	Windows XP (SP2), Vista
HDD:	4 GB of free space or more
ODD:	8X speed DVD-ROM drive (Disc Users only)
Network:	Multiplayer requires one disc or digital copy per PC and a 512 Kb/s or faster connection. Internet or network (up to 8 players). Broadband connection for online activation and online gameplay - 512 Kbps or faster
Recommended peripheral:	MS compatible mouse, Keyboard
Note:	Note that Windows 95, Windows 98, Windows ME, Windows NT 4.0, and Windows 2000 are not supported. NOTE - To install the game properly on Windows XP/Windows Vista, you will need administrator access to your machine. Consult your Windows XP/Windows Vista documentation for more information. *Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. The following major video card chipsets are supported: ATI Radeon X1300 series Radeon X1600 series Radeon X1800 series Radeon X1900 series Radeon HD 2400 series Radeon HD 2600 series Radeon HD 2900 series Radeon HD 3400 series Radeon HD 3600 series Radeon HD 3800 series Radeon HD 4800 series NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GeForce 6800 GeForce 7 series GeForce 8 series GeForce 9 series GeForce GTX 260 GeForce GTX 280 ***NOTE: Laptop versions of these chipsets may work, but are not officially supported. NVIDIA GeForce MX series not supported
